Description: Creatures in a 30-foot cube must succeed on a Con. save or take 12d8 necrotic damage. Plants wither and die.
The caster has resistance to the damage received and deals 1d6 extra damage of the same type on his next attack (damage/lvl).
1 or 2 creatures within 5 feet must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d6 acid damage (damage/lvl).
Creatures on a 30-ft-long, 5-ft-wide line must succeed on a Dex. save or taker 3d8 fire damage (damage/lvl).
Up to 3 creatures increase their hp maximum and current hp by 5 (+5 hp/lvl).
Alert the caster or activate an alarm if a Tiny or larger creature enters a warded 20-ft cube.
Give a new form depending on the chosen option (Aquatic Adaptation, Change Appearance, or Natural Weapons).
A beast with Intelligence 3 or less must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed (+1 beast/lvl).
A Tiny beast travels to deliver a 25 words message to a target (+48 h/lvl).
Willing targets within 30 ft turn into beasts of FP 4 or lower.
Create a skeleton from bones or a zombie from a corpse, who is under the caster control (+2 creatures/lvl).
Animate up to 10 non-magic objects and control their actions up to 500 ft (+2 items/lvl).
Prevent creatures other than undead and constructs from entering in a 10-ft radius.
Create a 10-ft-radius sphere in which spells and magic items no longer work.
Attract or repel (Wis. save in order to not be attracted or scared) a kind of creature designated within 60 ft.
Create an invisible eye with darkvision that sends the caster the mental image of what it sees.
Create 2 portals (max 500 ft between them) and allow teleport from one to the other.
Lock an objet (door, window, chest, etc) and the caster can set a password to suppresses the spell for 1 minute.
The caster gains 5 temporary hp and creatures who hits him with a melee attack take 5 cold damage (+5 hp and damage/lvl).
Creatures in a 10-ft radius must succeed on a Str. save or take 2d6 necrotic damage (damage/lvl)
The caster and up to 8 creatures are projected into the Astral Plane.
The caster obtains an omen about the result of an action within the next 30 min (weal, woe, both or nothing).
Creatures in a 30-ft radius gain resistance to necrotic damage and regain 1 hp when at 0 hp.
Creatures in a 30-ft radius can not become diseased, gain resistance to poison, and get advantage to various saving throws.
One target in a 30-ft radius regains 2d6 hp.
Give a beast or plant (Intelligence 3 or less) the ability to speek and senses similar to a human's for 30 days.
Up to 3 targets must succeed on a Cha. save or subtract 1d4 from their attack roll or saving throw (+1 creature/lvl).
If the weapon attack hits, deal an extra 5d10 force damage. Target reduced to 50 hp or fewer this way are banised.
The target must succeed on a Cha. save or be banished to a harmless demiplane (+1 creature/lvl).
The target's AC can't be less than 16.
Targets gain advantage on Wis. saving throws and death saving throws, and regain the maximum number of hp from healing.
Create a telepathic link with one beast to communicate with it.
The caster can see/hear/feel through the senses of a willing beast.
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or suffer an effect as a disadvantage to a check or lose an action (duration/lvl).
Create a Large hand with a Strength of 26 that can strike (4d8 force damage), push, grapple, or protect (damage/lvl).
Create a 100 x 20 x 5 ft wall that provides three-quarters cover and can inflict 6d10 slashing damage if passed through.
Make two melee spell attacks and deals 4d12 force damage. Critical hit (18-20) deals 12d12. +2 attacks as bonus action.
The caster gets resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.
Up to 3 targets can add 1d4 to their attack roll or saving throw (+1 creature/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 8d8 necrotic damage (damage/lvl).
If the attack hits, deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage and the target must succeed on a Con. save or be blinded.
The target must succeed on a Con. save or become blinded or deafened (+1 creature/lvl).
The caster has 50% of chance to switch to the Ethereal Plane, then returns to the space he vanished from on the next turn.
The caster's body becomes blurred and creatures that attack him have disadvantage on attack rolls against him.
Create up to 6 vertical 5 x 30 ft pillars of stone (+2 pillars/lvl). Possibility of crushing creatures to the ceiling.
If a weapon attack hits, deals 1d8 thunder damage if the target moves (damage/lvl).
If a weapon attack hits, deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage and the target sheds dim light in 5-ft radius (damage/lvl).
Creatures in a 15-ft cone must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d6 fire damage (damage/lvl).
Creatures in a 5-ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d10 lightning damage (damage/lvl) on each turn.
Creatures in a 20-foot-radius sphere must succeed on a Cha. save or no longer be charmed/frightened, or be indifferents.
The target must succeed on Dex. save or take 3d8 bludgeoning damage of an object up to 5 pounds (+5 pounds and +1d8/lvl).
3 willing creatures fall unconscious and gain the benefice of a short rest (+1 creature/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or becomes frightened (nbr of targets/lvl).
Perform a religious ceremony (bless water, give bonus to AC, ability check, saving throw, etc).
Up to 4 different targets must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d8 lightning damage (+1 target/lvl).
If the attack hits, deals 2d8 + 1d6 damage of a random type (damage/lvl). Rebound if double 8.
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed by the caster (duration/lvl).
The humanoid target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed by the caster (+1 creature/lvl).
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8 necrotic damage (damage/lvl) and the target can't regain hp immediately.
If the spell attack hits, deals 3d8 damage of a previously determined type (damage/lvl)
Creatures in a 60-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 8d6 necrotic damage (damage/lvl).
Friendly creatures in a 30-ft radius have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magicial effects.
Create an invisible sensor in a familiar location within 1 mile, allowing to see or to hear (to choose, can switch).
Create in 120 days the inert double of a living creature. If the original creature dies, its soul is transferred to the clone.
Creatures in a 5-ft cube take automatically 4d4 slashing damage (damage/lvl).
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 5d8 poison damage (damage/lvl).
6d10 creatures hp are dazzled in ascending order of their current hp (+2d10 hp/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or follow your order as Approach, Drop, Flee, Fall, Halt, etc (+1 creature/lvl).
Allow to obtain from a divine entity the answers (yes or no) to 3 questions.
The caster gets 3 informations about the surrounding territory. Doesn't function in dungeons or towns.
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or get a disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the caster.
The caster understands any spoken and written (1 min/page) language. Doesn't decode secret messages.
Targets within 30 ft must succeed on a Wis. save or move in a specified direction.
Creatures in a 60-ft cone must succeed on a Con. save or take 8d8 cold damage (damage/lvl).
Creatures in a 10-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Wis. save or can't take actions normally (+ 5-ft-radius/lvl).
Summon from 1 beast of CR 2 to 8 beasts of CR 1/4, friendly (nbr of creatures/lvl).
Creatures in a 60-ft cone must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d8 damage from the weapon/ammunition used.
Summon 1 celestial of CR 4, friendly (CR +1/lvl).
Summon 1 elemental of CR 5, friendly (CR +1/lvl).
Summon 1 fey of CR 6, friendly (CR +1/lvl).
Summon from 1 elemental of CR 2 to 8 elemental of CR 1/4, friendly (nbr of creatures/lvl).
Creatures in a 40-ft-radius, 20-ft-high cylinder must succeed on a Dex. save or take 8d8 damage from the weapon/ammunition used.
Summon from 1 fey of CR 2 to 8 fey of CR 1/4, friendly (nbr of creatures/lvl).
Contact an extraplanar entity to ask it 5 questions if an Int. save is successful. Otherwise, 6d6 psychic damage.
If the spell attack hits, target is afflicted with a disease to choose from 6 proposed.
Condition the activation of a 5th level spell or lower that can target the caster.
Create a flame that produces a light equivalent in brightness to a torch, but does not emit any heat.
Control nonmagical fires to expand, extinguish, enlarge, shape simple forms, etc.
Control the water in a 100-ft cube (cause a flood, part the water, redirect the flow, create a whirlpool).
Modify gradually the climatic conditions outdoors (precipitation, temperature and wind force).
Controls air in a 100-ft cube and produce an effect (Gusts, Downdraft or Updraft).
4 ammunition deal 1d6 piercing damage if the target doesn't succeed on a Dex. save (nbr of ammunition/lvl).
In reaction, fail a spell of 3rd level or lower. Ability check if the spell is 4th level or higher (threshold/lvl).
Creatures in a 5-ft cube must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d8 fire damage (damage/lvl).
Create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water, enough to sustain 15 humanoids for 24 hours.
Create one homunculus and the caster can transfer his hit points to it up to his next long rest.
Create or destroy up to 10 gallons of water (+10 gallons/lvl).
Up to 3 Medium or Small humanoids corpses become a ghoul who obey the caster for 24 h (nbr and type of creatures/lvl).
Create a non-living object made of vegetable matter or mineral and no larger than a 5-ft cube (+5 ft/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed. It then can attack a target designated by the caster.
If the spell attack hits, 7 motes deal 4d12 radiant damage each (+1 mote/lvl).
Friendly creatures in a 30-ft radius deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage when they hit with a weapon attack.
1 creature regains 1d8+Ability.Mod (+1d8 hp/lvl).
Create up to 4 torch-sized lights that shed dim light in a 10-ft radius and can be moved later up to 60 ft.
Up to 5 Small or Medium corpses become zombie or skeleton under the caster control (+2 corpses/lvl).
Fill a 15-ft-radius sphere of magical darkness.
The target can see in the dark within 60 feet.
Creatures in a 30-ft-radius, 40-ft-high cylinder must succeed on a Con. save or take 4d10 radiant damage.
Create a sphere that sheds bright light in a 60-ft radius and dim light in an additional 60-ft radius.
When the target drops to 0 hp for the first time, it automatically returns to 1 hp.
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 12d6 fire damage (damage/lvl).
Create a door that leads to a demiplane (30-ft cube). Creatures still in the demiplane at the end of the spell are trapped.
Targets in a 30-ft radius must succeed on a Con. save or take 5d6 thunder damage and 5d6 radiant or necrotic damage.
The caster senses and locates aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 ft.
The caster senses the presence of magic in a 30-ft radius and learns its school of magic.
The caster senses and identifies poison, poisonous creature, or disease within 30 ft.
The caster detects the superficial thoughts of a creature within 30 ft, and the deepest if the target misses a Wis. save.
The caster and another creature of the same size are teleported to a maximum of 500 feet.
Modify the appearance of the caster (its physical and its equipment) thanks to an illusion.
The target must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d6+40 force damage (damage/lvl). An Large or smaller object is disintegrated.
End a condition (charmed, frightened, or possessed) or bannish a creature to its home plane (Cha. save).
End spells of 3rd level 3 or lower on a target. Ability check for each spell of 4th level or higher (threshold/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or take 3d6 psychic damage and move away (damage/lvl).
The caster gets a truthful reply to 1 question about an event to occur within 7 days.
If a weapon attack hits, deals an extra 1d4 radiant damage.
Targets must succeed on a Cha. save or suffer an effect (deafened, blinded, etc). Some creatures are banned.
A beast within 60 ft must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and obey the launcher (duration/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and obey the caster (duration/lvl).
One humanoid must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and obey the caster (duration/lvl).
Spew a 15-ft cone that deals 3d6 acid, cold, fire, lightning, or poison damage in case of failed Dex. save (damage/lvl).
Mark a 10 pounds or less object and allow to teleport it into the caster hand, wherever it is, if not held.
Shape the dreams of a sleeping creature who can take 3d6 psychic damage if it fails on a Wis. save.
You and up to 8 willing creatures fall unconscious and are physically transported to another world on the material plan.
Protect a 30 x 30 x 30 ft area with fog, vines, animated trees, or other effects.
Provide various minor effects related to nature (weather forecast, flowering, sensory effect, etc).
Creatures within 5 ft must succeed on a Str. save or take 1d8 bludgeoning damage (damage/lvl).
Creatures in a 10-foot radius must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d6 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone (damage/lvl).
Target within 300 ft must succeed on a Str. save or its flying speed is reduced to 0 (descends at 60 ft/round).
Creatures in a 100-ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or be knocked prone. Cause damage to structures.
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d10 force damage (nbr of beam/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Con. save or suffer an extra 2d6 damage of a specific type (+1 target/lvl).
A weapon becomes magical with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and deal an extra 1d4 damage of a chosen type (bonus/lvl).
The target must succeed on an Int. save or not be able to distinguish friend from foe ; all are ennemis for it.
The target must succeed on a Dex. save or take 4d8 necrotic damage each turn (+1d8/lvl).
The target gains advantage on ability checks for one predefined ability, and other bonuses in such cases (+1 creature/lvl).
Double or halve the size of a creature (Con. save) or an object.
The target must succeed on a Str. save or be restrained and take 1d6 piercing damage (damage/lvl).
Creatures in a 20-ft square (difficult terrain) must succeed on a Str. save or be restrained.
Targets must succeed on a Wis. save or have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to perceive others creatures.
Creatures in a 20-foot cube (difficult terrain) must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d12 bludgeoning damage (damage/lvl).
The caster is projected into the Ethereal Plane (nbr of creatures/lvl).
Creatures in a 20-ft square must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d6 bludgeoning damage and be restrained.
The caster can take the Dash action by using a bonus action.
The target in a 60-ft radius must succeed on a Wis. save or take on a the following effects: asleep, panicked or sickened.
Convert raw materials into Large or smaller simples objects of the same material.
Creatures in a 20-ft cube must succeed on a Dex. save or grant advantage against them to attackers.
The caster gains 1d4+4 temporary hit points (+5 hp/lvl).
Teleport the caster up to 60 ft on each round with a bonus action.
Creatures in a 30-ft cone must succeed on a Wis. save or drop whatever they are holding, become frightened and move away.
Up to 5 creatures fall at 60 feet per round and take no falling damage before the spell ends.
The target take 4d6 psychic damage and must succeed on an Int. save or his Charisma and Intelligence scores become 1.
The willing target appears dead to all outward inspection.
Summon a small animal that obeys the caster and telepathically shares his senses with him.
Summon a spirit that assumes the form a steed (griffon, pegasus, etc) telepathically linked to the caster.
Summon a spirit that assumes the form a steed (horse, elk, etc) telepathically linked to the caster.
Determine the shortest and most direct physical path to reach a known destination.
The caster senses the presence of any trap in a 120-fr radius, but the spell don't give their location.
The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 7d8+30 necrotic damage. If killed, becomes a zombie under the caster command.
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d10 fire damage (damage/lvl). An object can ignite.
The caster gains resistance to cold or fire damage, and deals 2d8 damage to attackers who hit him within 5 ft.
Creatures in ten 10-ft cube must succeed on a Dex. save or take 7d10 fire damage.
Creatures in a 20-ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or take 8d6 fire damage (damage/lvl).
12 arrows/bolts deal an extra 1d6 fire damage (+2 ammunition/lvl).
If the spell attack hits, deals 3d6 fire damage (damage/lvl). Shed bright light in 10 ft and dim light in additional 10 ft.
Creatures in a 10-ft-radius, 40-ft-high cylinder must succeed on a Dex. save or take 4d6 fire and 4d6 radiant (damage/lvl).
Creatures within 5 ft from a 5-ft-diameter sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d6 fire damage (damage/lvl).
The target within 60 ft must succeed on a Con. save or be restrained, or petrified after 3 failures.
The target gets a flying speed of 60 ft (+1 creature/lvl).
Makes an area heavily obscured in a 20-ft-radius sphere (+20 ft/lvl).
Prevent teleporting to the protected area and inflicts 5d10 radiant or necrotic damage to some type of creatures.
Creates a 20-ft cage or a 10-ft box of magical force that traps a creature. Escape by magicial means only.
1 creature sees its near future, can not be surprised and has advantage on his rolls. Attacks against it have disadvantage.
Target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, spells or water.
The casters gets advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one chosen creature that isn't hostile toward him.
The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 1d6 cold damage and have disadvantage on next attack roll (damage/lvl).
The target turns into a cloud, gets a flying speed of 10 ft, and can pass through small holes.
Create a portal to another plan. Also allows to summon a creature from another plane.
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and take 5d10 psychic if it doesn't obey (duration/lvl).
Protect a corpse from decay or to become undead.
Transform insects (from 10 centipedes to 1 scorpion) into giant creatures that obey the caster's orders.
Give 15 to a Charisma check and hides the lies during a magic detection.
Block 5th level spells or lower within a 10-ft radius (threshold/lvl).
A glyph on an object deals 5d8 damage in a 20-ft radius (damage/lvl) or casts a 3rd level spell (lvl/lvl) when triggered.
Create up to 10 berries that restore 1 hp each and keep their power for 24 hours.
The target must succeed on a Dex. save or be pulled 20 ft toward the vine.
Creatures in a 10-ft square (difficult terrain) must succeed on a Dex. save or fall prone.
The target becomes invisible for 1 minute.
End one condition (charmed or petrified), one curse, any ability scores or hp reduction, or one exhaustion level.
If a weapon attack hits, deals also fire damage equal to Ability.Mod to another creature (damage/lvl) within 5 ft.
Hostiles creatures within a 10-ft radius of the created guardian must succeed on a Dex. save or take 20 radiant damage.
Transform the caster into a Primal Beast (+10 ft, darkvision, ...) or a Great Tree (+10 hp, advantage to some rolls, ...).
Create a ward that protect a 50-ft square. Can set a password to immunize individuals.
The target can add 1d4 to one ability check of its choice.
If the spell attack hits, deals 4d6 radiant damage (damage/lvl) and the next attack roll will have advantage.
Control air to move objects or creatures (Medium or smaller) or create harmless sensory effects.
Creatures on a 60-ft-long, 10-ft-wide line mus succeed on a Str. save or be pushed 15 ft away.
Creatures in a 5-ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d10 piercing damage (damage/lvl).
Prevent celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead to enter a 60-ft-radius area and protect/handicap the targets.
Make a natural terrain looks like another type (for example a road becomes a swamp or a crevasse).
The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 14d6 necrotic damage. The spell can't kill it however.
Target's speed is doubled. It also gains a +2 bonus to AC, advantage to Dex. saves and 1 additional action.
1 creature regains 70 hp and are cured of diseases, blindness, and deafness (+10 hp/lvl).
Creatures in touch with the spirit gain 1d6 hp (+1d6 hp/lvl).
1 creature regains 1d4+Ability.Mod (+1d4 hp/lvl).
Creatures in physical contact with the metal object take 2d8 fire damage (damage/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d10 fire damage (damage/lvl).
Produce a feast for 12 guests that cures diseases, immunizes to poison and increases hp by 2d10 for 24 hours.
The target is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hp equal to its Ability.Mod each turns (+1 creature/lvl).
If an attack hits, deals an extra 1d6 necrotic damage. Disadvantage on achosem ability check (duration/lvl).
Target must succeed on a Wis. save or be paralyzed (+1 creature/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be paralyzed (+1 creature/lvl).
Targets in a 30-ft radius have advantage on saving throws. Other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against them.
The touched weapon shines, deals an extra 2d8 radiant damage, and can burst on a 30-ft radius (Save or 4d8 radiant).
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius sphere take 2d6 cold damage et must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d6 acid damage.
The target take an extra 1d6 damage and caster has advantage on Wisdom (Perception/Survival) checks to find it (duration/lvl).
Creatures in a 30-ft cube must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and incapacitated, with a speed of 0.
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d10 piercing damage + Dex. save or 2d6 cold damage (damage/lvl) within 5 ft.
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius, 40-ft-high cylinder must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d8 bludgeoning damage and 4d6 cold damage.
The caster obtains properties of a magic item (attunement, charges) or knows if an item or a creature is affected by a spell.
Creatures that see this illusory Huge dragon must succedd on a Wis. save or be frightened for 1 min.
Write a secret message that can only be read by a designated target or a creature with truesight.
The target within 90 ft must succeed on a Dex. save or take 8d6 fire damage and 4d6 fire damage thereafter.
The target within 30 ft must succeed on a Wis. save or be held prisoner. The form is to choose from 6 options.
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d8 fire damage.
Summon 1 devil CR 6 unfriendly (CR +1/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 1d6 poison damage and move 5 ft in a random direction (damage/lvl).
If the spell attack hits, deals 3d10 necrotic damage (damage/lvl).
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 4d10 piercing damage (damage/lvl).
A willing creature has resistance to psychic damage and advantage on Int., Wis. and Cha. saving throws (+1 creature/lvl).
Creatures in a 15-ft-long line must succeed on a Dex. save or take 4d8 fire damage. Immunity and resistance to caster.
Creatures in a 15-ft cone must succeed on a Con. save or take 4d6 cold damage. Immunity and resistance to caster.
Creatures in a 15-ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or be knocked prone. Resistance and move across earth/stone.
Creatures in a 15-ft cube must succeed on a Con. save or take 2d10 bludgeoning damage. Flying speed 60 ft.
The target becomes invisible during 1 hour or until she attacks or casts a spell (+1 creature/lvl).
The caster gains immunity to all damage.
The target gets a jump distance multiplicated by 3.
Unlock or unbar 1 object (door, chest, padlock, set of manacles, etc) or suppressed the arcane lock spell for 10 minutes.
The caster obtains information about a person, place, or object. The lore consist of tales or stories.
Hide a chest (3 x 2 x 2 ft) and its contents in the Ethereal Plane.
Create a 10-ft-radius dome that can shelter and protect 9 Medium creatures with the caster.
End one disease or one condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned) on 1 creature.
1 creature or object that weighs up to 500 pounds rises vertically up to 20 ft then remains suspended.
The caster takes 4d8 necrotic damage and another creature gains twice the amount (+1d8 hp/lvl).
Make an object to shed bright light in a 20-ft radius and dim light in an additional 20-ft radius.
If the attack hits, deals 4d8 Iightning damage. Creatures within 10 ft must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d8 lightning damage.
Creatures on a 100-ft-long, 5-ft-wide line must succeed on a Dex. save or take 8d6 lightning damage (damage/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Str. save or take 1d8 lightning damage and be pulled up to 10 ft.
Give the direction and distance to a kind of beast or plant within 5 miles.
The caster senses the direction in which a familiar creature is within a 1000-ft radius.
The caster senses the direction to the location of an objet you are familiar with, within a 1000 ft radius.
The target gets a speed increased by 10 ft (+1 creature/lvl).
Creatures in a 60-ft-radius sphere of darkness must succeed on a Wis. save or take 8d8 psychic damage.
Creatures in a 30-ft radius must succeed on a Str. save or take 6d6 bludgeoning damage and be pulled towards the center.
The target, willing and not wearing armor, gets an AC equal to 13+Dex.Mod.
Create a spectral hand that can in a 30-ft radius manipulate an object, open a door, stow an item, etc.
Create a 10-ft-radius, 20-ft-tall cylinder that protect from celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and/or undead (+1 h/lvl).
The caster projects his soul into an urn and then returns to his body or possesses a humanoid body.
3 missiles deal automatically 1d4+1 force damage each to one or several creatures (+1 missile/lvl).
Creates a magical mouth that will repeat a message of up to 25 words when a trigger condition is met.
Up to 3 pebbles deal 1d6 + Ability.Mod bludgeoning damage if the spell attack hits.
Turn a weapon into a +1 magic weapon for attack rolls and damage rolls (+2 or +3 bonus/lvl).
Create the image of an animated object or creature, with sounds and smells (without concentration/lvl).
Up to 6 creatures regain 3d8+Spell.Ability.Mod (+1d8 hp/lvl).
Several creatures regain a total of 700 ph and are cured of diseases, blindness, and deafness.
Up to 6 creatures regain 1d4+Ability.Mod (+1d4 hp/lvl).
Transform up to 10 creatures into new beast forms whose CR/level are equal to or less than the target's CR/level.
Up to 12 targets must succeed on a Wis. save or follow the suggestion given by the caster (duration/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Str. save or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage and be restrained.
Banish a creature into a labyrinthine demiplane. Intelligence check to escape before the end of the spell.
The caster can penetrate the stone.
If the spell attack hits, deals 4d4 acid damage, then 2d4 acid damage on the next round (damage/lvl).
Creatures within 5 ft must succeed on a Dex.save or take 2d6 fire damage for each of the 6 meteors (+2 meteors/lvl).
Repair break or tear in an object (broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, torn cloak, leaking wineskin, etc).
The target must succeed on an Int. save or take 5d10 psychic damage and believe to be surrounded by fire or other hazard.
The caster whispers a message to a creature within 120 ft who will be the only one to hear it. It can reply the same way.
Creatures in a 40-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 20d6 fire damage and 20d6 bludgeoning damage.
Let erupt a forteresse of stone on a 120 x 120 ft area for 7 days.
The target is immune to psychic damage, reading thoughts, divination spells, and the charmed condition.
The target must succeed on an Int. save or take 1d6 psychic damage and substract -1d4 on it's next saving throw (damage/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or take 3d8 psychic damage (damage/lvl).
Create a sound or an immobile image of an object no larger than a 5-ft cube.
Tansform the appearance (sight, sound, smell and feel) of a 1 mile square.
Create 3 illusory duplicates of the caster, each of them having a CA equal to 10 + Dex.Mod and being destroyed if they are hit.
The caster becomes invisible and creates a double that moves, acts and speaks. The caster can see and hear through this double.
The caster is teleported up to 30 feet.
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and its memory altered (seniority of memories/lvl).
Control dirt or stone to excavate, shape, turn it into difficult terrain, etc.
Creatures in a 5-ft-radius, 40-ft-high cylinder must succeed on a Con. save or take 2d10 radiant damage (damage/lvl).
Summon an invisible watchdog that barks when a creature approaches and attacks it (4d8 piercing damage).
Create an extradimensional mansion with all the comforts that can shelter the caster and other creatures.
Create a secure cube up to 100 ft on each side. The type of protection is to choose (+100 ft on each side/lvl).
If the spell attack hits, deals 3d10 force damage. The sword can move.
Shape dirt, sand, or clay, but not stone (raise, lower, flatten, create a trench, etc) in a 40-ft square in 10 min.
The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 5d12 necrotic damage. Killed that way, the target rises as a zombi.
Protect a creature or an object from any divination magic or magical scrying.
Reveal false information about a creature or an object that would be the target of a divination spell.
Creatures in a 60-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 10d6 cold damage (damage/lvl).
The Large size or smaller target must succeedd on a Dex. save or be enclosed for the spell duration.
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or dance (disadvantage on Dex. save and attack rolls).
The caster and his allies within 30 ft get a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Discretion) checks and leave behind no tracks or traces.
Open a 5-ft wide, 8-ft tall, 20-ft deep passage through stone, wood or plaster.
Tha target must succeed on an Int. save or perceive as real an object or creature created by the caster (with sound).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be frightened then take 4d10 psychic damage (damage/lvl) on each of it's turn.
Create a quasi-real Large horselike creature and everything to mount it.
Summon a celestial, elemental, or fiend that will help the caster in exchange for payment (1000 gp/h, sacrifice, quest, etc).
The target (celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend) must succeed on a Cha. save or serve the caster (duration/lvl).
The caster and up to 8 creatures are transported to another plane of existence, or a creature is banished (Cha. save).
Plants in the area grow vigorously, or over a year the plants produce twice the normal amount of food.
The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 1d12 poison damage (damage/lvl).
Transform a target into a new beast form whose CR/level is equal to or less than the target's CR/level.
The target regains all its hp and charmed, frightened, paralyzed, and stunned conditions end.
The target (100 hp or fewer) dies!
The target (100 hp max) has its speed reduced to 10 ft, disadvantage to d20 rolls and has to make a Con. save to cast spells.
The target (150 hp or fewer) is stunned until it succeeds on a Con. save.
Up to 6 creatures regain 2d8+Ability.Mod (+1d8 hp/lvl).
Minor magical trick (sensory effect, light a torch, clean an object, warm, make a symbol appear, create a trinket, etc).
If the melee spell attack hits, deals 1d10 acid damage (damage/lvl).
The caster gets resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, and thunder damage or immunity to a single type.
Creatures in a 60-ft cone must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d6 damage of a randomly determined type.
Create a multi-layered wall that inflicts different effects and damage depending on the layer.
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8 fire damage (damage/lvl). Shed bright light in 10 ft and dim light in additional 10 ft.
Create the image of an animated object or creature, with sounds, for 5 min, with a triggering condition.
Create a copy of the caster that mimics him, moves and emits sounds. The caster can see and hear through this double.
The target gains resistance to one damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder).
The target is protected (disadvantage on attack rolls) against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.
Neutralize 1 poison in one creature, give advantage on saving throws againt being poisoned, and resistance to poison damage.
Up to 10 creatures must succeed on an Int. save or take 14d6 psychic damage.
Purified and rendered free of poison and disease nonmagical food and drink in a 5-ft-radius sphere.
Target flame within 60-ft and make them explode (Con. save or blinded) or spread smoke (heavily obscured).
Take back to life (1 hp) a creature died for no longer than 10 days. Doesn't restore missing body parts.
Create a telepathic link between up to 8 people in a 30-ft radius for 1 hour.
If the spell attack hits, the target deals only half damage with a weapon attack that use Strength (Con. save).
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8 cold damage (damage/lvl) and the target's speed is reduced by 10 ft.
If the attack hits, deals 2d8 poison damage (damage/lvl) and the target can be poisoned (Con. save).
The target regains 4d8+15 hp then 1 hp per round and its severed members are restored.
Reincarnate the soul of an humanoid died for no longer than 10 days. The race of the new body is determined at random.
End all curses affecting one creature or object.
The target can add 1d4 to one saving throw of its choice.
Take back to life (all hp) a creature died for no longer than 100 years (except of old age). Restore any missing body parts.
Invert gravity in a 50-ft-radius, 100-ft-high cylinder.
Take back to 1 hp a creature that has died within the last minute (except of old age).
Vertically raise a rope that lead to an extradimensional space that can hold 8 Medium creatures.
The target must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d8 radiant damage (damage/lvl).
The target can make a Wis. save to avoid attacks or harmful spells that target it directly.
Up to 5 creatures are teleported (Wis. save if unwilling) within 120 ft.
If the spell attacks hit, 3 rays deal 2d6 fire damage each (+1 ray/lvl).
Allow you to see and hear a specific creature (can also target a location) on the same plane (Wis. save).
If the attack hits, deals an extra 1d6 fire damage and ignite the target (damage/lvl).
The caster sees invisible creatures and objects, and into the Ethereal Plane.
Change physical appearance as well as clothing and equipment of targets (saving throw for unwilling).
Send a 25-words message to a creature you are familiar with, regardless of the distance or the plan. It can answer it.
Protect a willing creature (who becomes invisible and unconscious) or an object from divination spells.
Create a weapon that deals 2d8 psychic damage with the finesse, light, and thrown properties (damage/lvl).
Tha caster gains resistance to radiant damage and deals 2d8 necrotic damage to creatures that hit him with an attack.
Control water to obtain various minor effects such as changing color, freezing, changing the flow, etc.
The caster takes the form of a creature he has seen at least once with a CR equal to its level or lower.
Creatures in a 10-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 3d8 thunder damage (damage/lvl).
In reaction, the caster gains a +5 bonus to AC and take no damage from the magic missile spell.
The target gets a +2 bonus to AC.
Make magical a wooden weapon. Its damage become a d8 and the caster can use his spellcasting ability instead of Strength.
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8 lightning damage (damage/lvl) and the target can't take reactions.
Creatures in a 30-ft radius must succeed on a Con. save or take 4d10 radiant damage and one level of exhaustion.
Block all sounds within a 20-ft-radius sphere.
Create the image of an object or a creature (without sound and no larger than a 15-ft cube) and lets it move.
Create a duplicate of a beast or humanoid with the same abilities, half of the hp and without equipment.
The target doubles its proficiency bonus for one skill.
Create up to 10 words in the clouds.
5d8 hp of creatures fall unconscious, starting with the creature with the lowest current hp (+2d8 hp/lvl).
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius, 20-ft-tall cylinder (heavily obscured) must succeed on a Dex. save or fall prone.
Up to 6 targets must succeed on a Wis. save, or have their speed and actions reduced and -2 to CA and Dex. saves.
Create a magic trap (Dex. save or the Small to Large size creature is hoisted into the air).
Creatures in a 5-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d6 cold damage (damage/lvl).
Snatch a soul to regain hp, ask it a question, get advantage to a roll, or see a place it saw in life.
1 living creature with 0 hit points becomes stable.
The caster communicates with beats that can share information or help.
Allow a corpse that still has a mouth and is not an undead to answer 5 questions to the caster.
The caster can communicate with plants within 30 ft, and turns difficult terrain into ordinary terrain or vice versa.
The target can move along vertical surfaces while leaving its hands free and gains climbing speed.
Creatures in a 20-ft radius (difficult terrain) take 2d4 piercing damage for every 5 ft of movement.
Targets in a 15-ft radius must succeed on a Wis. save or take 3d8 radiant or necrotic damage (damage/lvl).
If the attack hits, deals an extra 1d8 radiant, necrotic, or cold damage. Target can't regain hp this turn (damage/lvl).
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8+Ability.Mod force damage (damage/lvl). A bonus action allows another attack.
If the attack hits, deals an extra 4d6 pyschic damage and the target must succeed on a Wis. save or have a disadvantage.
If the spell attack hits, deals 6d10 force damage to 5 creatures, then the caster teleports.
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or spend their action that turn retching and reeling.
Give a stone no more than 5 ft in any dimension any shape, or create an opening in it.
The target gets resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Creatures in a 360-ft radius must succeed on a Con. save or be deafened and suffer various damage and effects.
Creatures in a 20-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Str. save or take 2d6 bludgeoning damage (damage/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or follow the suggestion given by the caster in one or two sentences.
Summon 1 aberrant spirit (beholderkin, slaad, or star spawn), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Summon 1 bestial spirit (air, land, or water), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Summon 1 celestial spirit (avenger or defender), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Summon 1 spirit of a construct (clay, metal, or stone), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Summon 1 elemental spirit (air, earth, fire, or water), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Summon 1 fey spirit (fuming, mirthful, or tricksy), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Summon 1 fiendish spirit (demon, devil, or yugoloth), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Summon 1 demon of CR 5, friendly (CR +1/lvl).
Summon 2 demons of CR 1 to 8 demons of CR 1/4, unfriendly (nbr of creatures/lvl).
Summon 1 shadowy spirit (fury, despair, or fear), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Summon 1 undead spirit (ghostly, putrid, or skeletal), friendly (stat block/your lvl).
Creatures on a 5-ft-wide, 60-ft-long line must succeed on a Con. save or take 6d8 radiant damage and be blinded.
Creatures in a 60-ft radius must succeed on a Con. save or take 12d6 radiant damage and be blinded for 1 min.
Make a quiver to produce an endless supply of nonmagical ammunition, allowing 2 attacks per round with a bonus action.
Creatures in a 5-ft-radius must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d6 force damage (damage/lvl).
Set the trigger and the effect of a glyph on an object (death, discord, fear, hopelessness, insanity, pain, sleep, etc).
Creatures in a 20-ft radius must succeed on an Int. save or take 8d6 psychic damage.
Creatures in a 30 ft long 5 ft wide line must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d4 acid damage each turn (+2d4/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or falls into fits of laughter, fall prone and becoming incapacitated.
Target must succeed on an Int. save or take 3d6 psychic damage and choose to move or take an action next turn (+1 creature/lvl).
Immune to fire/poison or radiant/necrotic damage, 40 ft flying speed, +2 AC bonus, weapons are magical, 2 attacks.
Move a creature (Huge or smaller) or object (up to 1,000 pounds) by thought in case of successful contest.
Comunicate via telepathy with a known and willing creature on the same plane of existence.
The caster and 8 creatures are teleported anywhere on the same plane. Risk of failure depending on the destination familiarity.
Create a circle that allows anyone to be teleported to another teleportation circle known to the caster.
Let erupt a temple dedicated to a god on a 120 x 120 ft area for 1 day.
Create a floating 3-ft-diameter disk that can support up to 500 pounds and follows the caster.
The caster gains 50 hp, advantage to attack rolls, an extra 2d12 force damage, martial proficiencies and two attacks per round.
Create various minor effects to impress or distract creatures.
If the attack hits, deals 1d6 piercing damage and pull the target (Larger or smaller) up to 10 ft (damage/lvl).
The caster teleports and creatures within 10 ft must succeed on a Con. save or take 3d10 thunder damage.
Creatures within 5 ft must succeed on a Con. save or take 1d6 thunder damage (damage/lvl).
If the attack hits, deals an extra 2d6 thunder damage, and target must succeed on a Str. save or be pushed and knocked prone.
Creatures in a 15-ft cube must succeed on a Con. save or take 2d8 thunder damage (damage/lvl).
Creatures in an 30 x 10 x 10 ft area must succeed on Dex. save or take 4d8 bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone.
Stop the time during 1d4+1 turns for everyone except for the caster.
Transform one Tiny object into a creature with arms and legs under the caster control (+2 objects/lvl).
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or take 1d8 or 1d12 necrotic damage (damage/lvl).
The target understands and speaks any spoken language it hears.
Transform a 40-ft cube of rock into mud or of mud into rock.
The caster can move from one plant to another plant (Large or larger) using 5 ft.
The caster can move from one tree to another tree of the same kind (500 ft max between both) using 5 ft.
Transform a creature or object into a new form (creature <-> object) of FP/level at most equal to the FP/level of the crea
Take back to life (all hp) a creature died for no longer than 200 years (except of old age), even without the original body.
The target gets truesight, sees magic secret doors and in the Ethereal Plane.
The caster gains advantage on his first attack roll against a target.
Creatures in a 300-ft-long, 300-ft-high, 50-ft-thick area must succeed on a Str. save or take 6d10 bludgeoning damage.
Create an invisible servant who performs simple tasks (bring something back, clean up, maintain a fire, serve at table, etc).
If the spell attack hits, deals 3d6 necrotic damage (damage/lvl) and the caster regains 50% of his hp.
The target must succeed on a Wis. save or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on its attack roll (damage/lvl).
Creatures within 20-ft must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d4 acid damage (damage/lvl) then 5d4 acid damage on its turn.
Create a 60 x 20 x 1 ft wall of fire. Creatures inside or within 10ft of one side of the wall take 5d8 fire damage (damage/lvl).
Create a physically insurmountable wall of force (ten 10-ft panels) immune to all types of damage.
Create a wall of ice (ten 10-ft panels) that can be damaged and can inflict 5d6 cold damage if passed through (damage/lvl).
Create a 60-ft-long, 10-ft-high, 5-ft-thick wall of light that can deal 4d8 radiant damage to one target (damage/lvl).
Create a 30-ft-long, 10-ft-high, 10-ft-thick sand wall that blocks line of sight (blinded) but not movement.
Create a nonmagical wall of stone (ten 10-ft panels) that can be damaged.
Create an 60-ft-long, 10-ft-high, 5-ft-thick wall of brush that slows movement and can inflict 7d8 piercing damage (damage/lvl).
Create a 30-ft-long, 10-ft-high, 1-ft-thick wall of water that gives disadvantage on ranged attacks and halved fire damage.
The target gains +1 on AC, +1 on saving throws and resistance to all damage, but the caster shares damage.
Create strong wind (20 miles/h) in a 10-ft radius (deafen, extinguish flames, hedge out gas, difficult terrain, etc).
Up to 10 creatures gets the ability to breathe underwater.
Up to 10 creatures can move on a liquid surface (water, acid, mud, lava, etc) as if it were harmless solid ground.
Up to 4 Medium creatures or 1 Large creature in a 10-ft radius must succeed on a Str. save or be restrained.
Create a 20-ft cube filled by thick, sticky webs (difficult terrain) that can restrain creature (Dex. save).
Creatures in a 30-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Wis. save or be frightened and take 4d10 psychic damage each turn.
Creatures in a 10-ft-radius, 30-foot-high cylinder must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d6 blunt damage.
The caster and up to 10 creatures assume gaseous form (flying speed of 300 ft and resistance to damage from nonmagical weapon).
Create a 50-ft-long, 15-ft-high, 1-ft-thick wall of wind. Small flying creatures can't pass. Arrows and bolts are deflected.
Duplicate a 8th level spell or lower without components, or create another effect at the MD discretion.
If the spell attack hits, deals 1d12 lightning damage (damage/lvl) on each round.
Creatures in a 5-ft-radius must succeed on a Con. save or take 1d6 radiant damage (/lvl).
The caster and up to 5 other creatures are teleported to a previously designated sanctuary.
Animate trees, rocks, and grasses in a 60 x 60 x 60 ft cube.
If the attack hits, deals an extra 1d6 psychic damage and the target must succeed on a Wis. save or be frightened.
The caster's movement (+30 ft) doesn't provoque OA and he gets advantage to one attack roll that deals an extra 1d8 force.
Creatures within a 15-ft-radius sphere must succeed on a Cha. save or can not lie.
